text: Svetlana Kuznetsova was the defending champion, however she was unable to defend her title due to visa issues. Jessica Pegula won her first WTA title, defeating Camila Giorgi in the final, 6–2, 6–2. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Draw=== ====First Qualifier==== ====Second Qualifier==== ====Third Qualifier==== ====Fourth Qualifier==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Citi Open - Women's Singles 2019 Women's Singles
title: 2019 Citi Open – Women's Singles
